fields.dproc4: Specials Prep And Recovery - Paracentesis And Thoracentesis
fields.comments: Sah- 2024 Idph Ahq Footnotes P3-Pedatric Beds Set-Up & Staffed. Uw Health Swedishamerican Received Approval For An Additional 6 Licensed Pediatric Beds IN Late Cy2023. However, Beds Were Not Placed Into Service Until After 12/31/2023 And Are Now Included IN The Cy2024 Ahq. P4 & P9– Nicu Beds Set-Up & Staffed. For Cy2021, The Number Of Licensed Nicu Level III Beds Increased From 10 To 24 With The Opening Of The New Women’s & Children’s Tower (april 6, 2021) Under Coe E-019-17. There Were 14 Level Ii+ Beds That Converted To Level Iii. Uw Health Swedishamerican Received Approval For 8 Additional Licensed Nicu Beds Under Coe E-031-22. However, Beds Were Not Placed Into Service Until After 12/31/2023 And Are Now Included IN The Cy2024 Ahq. P6-Outpatients Served. Op Visits Include Not Only The Hospital, But Also The Provider-Based Clinics. The Provider Based Clinic Revenue (technical Component Only) And Associated Allowances Are Also Included On Page 17 Net Revenues. IN Cy2024, One Clinic Was Converted To Provider Based For Its Ancillary Departments Only (uw Health N Bell School Road Clinic 12/17/2024). P7-Surgical Procedures-Class B, Invasive, Non-Or. Class B Procedures May Occasionally Be Done IN Imaging Rooms, Based On Patient Specific Needs. For This Survey, We Have Not Included These IN The Class B Procedure Volumes. However, They Are Included On Page 10 IN The Hospital Diagnostic And Therapeutic Equipment Volumes. P8- Surgical Recovery Stations - Cy2024 Ahq Shifted 5 Beds To Stage 1 From Stage 2, As All Are Stage 1 Capable (1 For Labor & Delivery C-Sections/Other Gyne And 4 For Pacu (main Operating Room)). P9 – Cardiac Cath Lab Dedicated Rooms. Effective Cy21, There Is Now A Dedicated Ep Room. There Are 2 Dedicated Interventional Radiology/Peripheral Vascular Rooms And 2 Cath Procedure Rooms, But None Dedicated Solely To Diagnostic Vs. Interventional Types Of Procedures Alone. P9 – Cardiac Cath Lab Procedures By Type – Volumes Exclude Peripheral Vascular Cases And Implants. P12-Capital Exp. Only Capital Expenditures Made On Behalf Of Swedish American Hospital And Its Provider Based Facilities Were Included On Page 11. P17- Net Revenues -Amounts Reported Include Adjustments For Bad Debt. Aicpa Guidelines Classify Bad Debt, Allowances And Write-Offs As A Component Of Net Revenue For Financial Statement Purposes. Op Visits On Page 5 Include Not Only The Hospital, But Also The Provider-Based Clinics And Cancer Center. As Such, The Related Revenue (technical Component Only) And Associated Allowances Are Included On Page 17 Net Revenues.
fields.facility_diversity_comments: Illinois State-Specific Data Provided. The Goal Of Uw Health - Northern Illinois During The Reporting Period Was To Establish Procedures And Methods To Identify And Track Spending With Dbe Suppliers, And To Quantify Current Spending Levels IN Order To Clearly Define Measurable Standards And Goals For The Next Reporting Period.
fields.planned_diversity_expenditures: Uw Health - Northern Illinois Actively Seeks Supplier Diversity For New Construction And Renovation Projects.
fields.plan_for_diversity_recruitment: Uw Health - Northern Illinois Maintains A List Of Dbe Vendors/Suppliers That Is Included IN All Request For Proposal Solicitations For New Construction And Renovation Projects. General Contractors Are Requested To Include A List Of Dbe Subcontractors And Percentages Of Contract For All Project Proposals.
fields.challenges_to_diversity_recruitment: Our Challenge Is Finding Certified Dbe Vendors/Suppliers With The Experience, Expertise And Capacity To Successfully Execute Work IN The Healthcare Environment.
fields.hsfrb_assistance: It Would Be Helpful To Have A Single Portal To Search For Qualified Dbe Vendors Who Have The Unique Qualifications Necessary To Work IN Health Care Related Construction Services.
fields.certifications: Cms - Central Management Services, Sba - Small Business Association, VA - Veterans Administration, Far - Federal Acquisition Regulation, Gsa - General Services Administration, Illinois Upc - Unified Certification Program, City Of Rockford, City Of Chicago, IL Dot - Illinois Tollway Small Business Initiative.
fields.point_of_contact: Potential Vendors OR Suppliers Should Contact Uw Health - Northern Illinois Materials Management Department At (779)-696-4400
fields.enrollment_process: A Vendor Would Be Enrolled IN Our Vendor Monitoring System (vendormate) And Provide Them With Their Certification Documentation, Along With Tax Information, Safety Records, And Proof Of Insurance. Uw Health - Northern Illinois Has Added Custom Fields To Our Vendor Dictionary To Allow Designation And Tracking Of Diversely-Owned Vendors And Suppliers.
fields.examples_of_successes: Including A List Of Certified Dbe Vendors With Request For Proposal Packages Has Advised And Encouraged Our Prime Contractors That We Support Active Recruitment Of Diverse Vendors.
